shortdesc.p: This is how to make blueberry oatmeal waffles.

topic.title: Toast With Refried Beans and Avocado Recipe

shortdesc.p: Tasty, filling, but not overly heavy, this is ideal breakfast fare for those who want something beside the bacon and eggs.
A smoothie made with fresh veggie juice and blended with a healthy dose of spinach and ripe pear.
This isn't just any old oatmeal. It's like having dessert for breakfast.

topic.title: Vegan Alternative to Bacon-Egg Grilled Cheese

shortdesc.p: I found a great recipe for bacon-egg grilled cheese, but it doesn't work for vegans. Here's a great alternative.
It may be basic, but you'll love it!
